Classes

class  pilz_industrial_motion_planner::CommandPlanner
 MoveIt Plugin for Planning with Standard Robot Commands This planner is dedicated to return a instance of PlanningContext that corresponds to the requested motion command set as planner_id in the MotionPlanRequest). It can be easily extended with additional commands by creating a class inherting from PlanningContextLoader. More...
